section.p:
The slave market is a large, canvas-covered square. The poor unfortunate slaves, people from all over Harkuna - from the Feathered Lands, Golnir, criminals of Sokara, nomads from the steppes, are paraded in chains on a dais. Merchants and nobles bid for the slaves they want.
If there is a tick in the above box, immediately.
If not, and read on.
An unusual sale has come up - a little, furry, bat-winged humanoid. It is one of the Mannekyn People from Sky Mountain in the north and it is going for 50 Shards.

If you want to buy it, .
If not, you head back into town. .
